rows.label: tlk70000008_01_msg0001
rows.name:
Our squad's job is to guard the palace.
But they don't send anyone decent for
this job these days. Bleedin' shame.

rows.label: tlk70000008_01_msg0002
rows.name:
Problem is, the palace hasn't needed
defending in so long. No invasion gets
far enough to actually threaten it.

rows.label: tlk70000008_01_msg0003
rows.name:
Which is great, but it means our squad
is short on real fighters lately. Everyone
gets this job cos of family connections.

rows.label: tlk70000008_01_msg0004
rows.name:
All they do is skive off and swan about
admiring each others shoes. They don't
know the first thing about soldiering.

rows.label: tlk70000008_01_msg0005
rows.name:
It's a pretty dire situation. A real attack,
and we're on for a battering. This load
of arseholes won't know what hit 'em.

rows.label: tlk70000008_01_msg0006
rows.name:
It'd serve 'em right, too! Gwahahahah!
I wish I could replace the lot, but good
talent doesn't grow on trees, y'know!
